step_feedback.feedback: Good job initiating the movement by squeezing your shoulder blades back and down. Try to keep your elbows and wrists a bit more stable as you roll.
Excellent control in this step! Your shoulder blades are moving well. Continue to focus on smooth, circular motions.
You're completing the repetitions well. For the next set, try to keep your elbows and wrists a little closer to your body to maintain better form.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with your shoulder rolls! Remember to gently squeeze your shoulder blades back and down in a smooth circle. Try to keep your elbows and wrists steady as you move.
